message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes an end-to-end framework for learning local multi-view descriptors for 3D point clouds using a differentiable renderer and soft-view pooling module. This work involves computer vision (CV) techniques such as feature extraction and attention mechanisms, as well as machine learning (LG) techniques for end-to-end learning. The use of a differentiable renderer also suggests a potential application in graphics (GR) research. Additionally, the proposed framework can be applied to robotics (RO) tasks such as 3D registration. Finally, the use of neural networks for descriptor learning indicates a potential overlap with artificial intelligence (AI) research.
